author: Gary
comment: This app has a weird bug that drove me nuts till I finally Uninstalled it and the problem stopped. Whenever I tried to lower or raise the volume of media on my phone the media volume bar would start glitching moving back and forth by itself not lowering or raising the volume no matter what I did even when using the volume buttons on the phone. Phone is a Samsung note 8.

author: Winecup Sage
comment: I think Claudio has put a lot of TLC into this app.  The on screen volume bar is a nice touch amongst many, especially for Tablet users.  Reviewer: Non affiliated really old sysprog.

author: Brilliant Photo
comment: So far so good. Very useful for YouTube. And no need to use the hard buttons. The ability to customise colour is great too.

comment: It is closed after some time

author: Dragan Marjanovic
comment: Great set of features. Some of these might be buggy a bit sometimes though but overall app usability, configurability, user experience and friendliness are really high. Nice work!

comment: Nice because it keeps it simple, utilises native volume GUI.
Does not change the background color of the notification. Android still have volume in the notification
